description: The power stored using the move Stockpile\nis absorbed by the user to heal its HP.\nStoring more power heals more HP.

name: Heat Wave
description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath\non the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave\nthose Pokémon with a burn.

name: Hail
description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five\nturns. It damages all Pokémon except the\nIce type.

name: Torment
description: The user torments and enrages the\ntarget, making it incapable of using\nthe same move twice in a row.

name: Flatter
description: Flattery is used to confuse the target.\nHowever, this also raises the target’s\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Will-O-Wisp
description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white\nflame at the target to inflict a burn.

name: Memento
description: The user faints when using this move.\nIn return, this harshly lowers the target’s\nAttack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Facade
description: An attack move that doubles its power if\nthe user is poisoned, burned, or\nhas paralysis.

name: Focus Punch
description: The user focuses its mind before\nlaunching a punch. This move fails\nif the user is hit before it is used.

name: Smelling Salts
description: This attack inflicts double damage on a\ntarget with paralysis. This also cures the\ntarget’s paralysis, however.

name: Follow Me
description: The user draws attention to itself,\nmaking all targets take aim\nonly at the user.

name: Nature Power
description: An attack that makes use of nature’s\npower. Its effects vary depending on the\nuser’s environment.

name: Charge
description: The user boosts the power of the Electric\nmove it uses on the next turn. This also\nraises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Taunt
description: The target is taunted into a rage that\nallows it to use only attack moves\nfor three turns.

name: Helping Hand
description: The user assists an ally by boosting\nthe power of that ally’s attack.

name: Trick
description: The user catches the target off guard\nand swaps its held item with its own.

name: Role Play
description: The user mimics the target completely,\ncopying the target’s natural Ability.

name: Wish
description: One turn after this move is used,\nthe target’s HP is restored by\nhalf the user’s max HP.

name: Assist
description: The user hurriedly and randomly\nuses a move among those known\nby other Pokémon in the party.

name: Ingrain
description: The user lays roots that restore\nits HP on every turn. Because it is\nrooted, it can’t switch out.

name: Superpower
description: The user attacks the target with great\npower. However, this also lowers the\nuser’s Attack and Defense stats.

name: Magic Coat
description: A barrier reflects back to the target\nmoves like Leech Seed and moves\nthat damage status.

name: Recycle
description: The user recycles a held item that\nhas been used in battle so it can be\nused again.

name: Revenge
description: An attack move that inflicts double the\ndamage if the user has been hurt by the\nopponent in the same turn.

name: Brick Break
description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It\ncan also break barriers, such as Light\nScreen and Reflect.

name: Yawn
description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that\nlulls the target into falling asleep\non the next turn.

name: Knock Off
description: The user slaps down the target’s held item, and\nthat item can’t be used in that battle. The move\ndoes more damage if the target has a held item.

name: Endeavor
description: An attack move that cuts down the\ntarget’s HP to equal the user’s HP.

name: Eruption
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with\nexplosive fury. The lower the user’s HP,\nthe lower the move’s power.

name: Skill Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to\nexchange Abilities with the target.

name: Imprison
description: If opposing Pokémon know any move\nalso known by the user,\nthey are prevented from using it.

name: Refresh
description: The user rests to cure itself of a\npoisoning, burn, or paralysis.

name: Grudge
description: If the user faints, the user’s grudge\nfully depletes the PP of the opponent’s\nmove that knocked it out.

name: Snatch
description: The user steals the effects of any attempts\nto use a healing or stat-changing move.

name: Secret Power
description: The user attacks the target with a\nsecret power. Its additional effects vary\ndepending on the user’s environment.

name: Dive
description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats\nup and attacks on the next turn.

name: Arm Thrust
description: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed\narm thrusts that hit two to five times in\na row.

name: Camouflage
description: The user’s type is changed depending on\nits environment, such as at water’s edge,\nin grass, or in a cave.

name: Tail Glow
description: The user stares at flashing lights to\nfocus its mind, drastically raising its\nSp. Atk stat.

name: Luster Purge
description: The user lets loose a damaging burst\nof light. This may also lower the target’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Mist Ball
description: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and\ndamages the target. This may also lower\nthe target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Feather Dance
description: The user covers the target’s body with a\nmass of down that harshly lowers its\nAttack stat.

name: Teeter Dance
description: The user performs a wobbly dance that\nconfuses the Pokémon around it.

name: Blaze Kick
description: The user launches a kick that lands a\ncritical hit more easily.\nThis may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Mud Sport
description: The user covers itself with mud.\nThis weakens Electric-type moves\nfor five turns.

name: Ice Ball
description: The user continually rolls into the target\nover five turns. It becomes stronger\neach time it hits.

name: Needle Arm
description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its\nthorny arms. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: Slack Off
description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP\nby up to half of its max HP.

name: Hyper Voice
description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing\nshout with the power to inflict damage.

name: Poison Fang
description: The user bites the target with toxic\nfangs. This may also leave the target\nbadly poisoned.

name: Crush Claw
description: The user slashes the target with hard\nand sharp claws. This may also lower\nthe target’s Defense stat.

name: Blast Burn
description: The target is razed by a fiery explosion.\nThe user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Hydro Cannon
description: The target is hit with a watery blast.\nThe user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Meteor Mash
description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired\nlike a meteor. This may also raise\nthe user’s Attack stat.

name: Astonish
description: The user attacks the target while shouting\nin a startling fashion.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Weather Ball
description: An attack move that varies in power and\ntype depending on the weather.

name: Aromatherapy
description: The user releases a soothing scent that\nheals all status conditions affecting\nthe user’s party.

name: Fake Tears
description: The user feigns crying to fluster\nthe target, harshly lowering its\nSp. Def stat.

name: Air Cutter
description: The user launches razor-like wind\nto slash the opposing Pokémon.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Overheat
description: The user attacks the target at full power.\nThe attack’s recoil harshly lowers the\nuser’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Odor Sleuth
description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by\nNormal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also\nenables an evasive target to be hit.

name: Rock Tomb
description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also\nlowers the target’s Speed stat by preventing\nits movement.

name: Silver Wind
description: The target is attacked with powdery\nscales blown by wind.\nThis may also raise all the user’s stats.

name: Metal Sound
description: A horrible sound like scraping metal\nharshly lowers the target’s\nSp. Def stat.

name: Grass Whistle
description: The user plays a pleasant melody that\nlulls the target into a deep sleep.

name: Tickle
description: The user tickles the target into laughing,\nreducing its Attack and Defense stats.

name: Cosmic Power
description: The user absorbs a mystical power from\nspace to raise its Defense and\nSp. Def stats.

name: Water Spout
description: The user spouts water to damage opposing\nPokémon. The lower the user’s HP,\nthe lower the move’s power.

name: Signal Beam
description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of\nlight. This may also confuse the target.

name: Shadow Punch
description: The user throws a punch from the shadows.\nThis attack never misses.

name: Extrasensory
description: The user attacks with an odd,\nunseeable power.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: The user attacks the target with an\nuppercut thrown skyward with force.

name: Sand Tomb
description: The user traps the target inside a harshly\nraging sandstorm for four to five turns.

name: Sheer Cold
description: The target is attacked with a blast of\nabsolute-zero cold. The target faints\ninstantly if this attack hits.

name: Muddy Water
description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water\nat the opposing Pokémon.\nThis may also lower their accuracy.

name: Bullet Seed
description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the\ntarget two to five times in a row.

name: Aerial Ace
description: The user confounds the target with speed,\nthen slashes.\nThis attack never misses.

name: Icicle Spear
description: The user launches sharp icicles at the\ntarget two to five times in a row.

name: Iron Defense
description: The user hardens its body’s surface\nlike iron, sharply raising its\nDefense stat.

name: Block
description: The user blocks the target’s way with arms\nspread wide to prevent escape.

name: Howl
description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit,\nwhich raises its Attack stat.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge,\nsharp claws.

name: Frenzy Plant
description: The user slams the target with\nan enormous tree.\nThe user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Bulk Up
description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up\nits body, raising both its Attack and\nDefense stats.

name: Bounce
description: The user bounces up high, then drops on\nthe target on the second turn. This may\nalso leave the target with paralysis.

name: Mud Shot
description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud\nat the target.\nThis also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Poison Tail
description: The user hits the target with its tail.\nThis may also poison the target.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Covet
description: The user endearingly approaches\nthe target, then steals the target’s\nheld item.

name: Volt Tackle
description: The user electrifies itself, then charges.\nThis also damages the user quite a lot.\nThis may leave the target with paralysis.

name: Magical Leaf
description: The user scatters curious leaves\nthat chase the target.\nThis attack never misses.

name: Water Sport
description: The user soaks itself with water.\nThis weakens Fire-type moves\nfor five turns.

name: Calm Mind
description: The user quietly focuses its mind and\ncalms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and\nSp. Def stats.

name: Leaf Blade
description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a\nsword and attacks by cutting its target.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Dragon Dance
description: The user vigorously performs a mystic,\npowerful dance that raises its Attack and\nSpeed stats.

name: Rock Blast
description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target.\nTwo to five rocks are launched in a row.

name: Shock Wave
description: The user strikes the target with a quick\njolt of electricity.\nThis attack never misses.

name: Water Pulse
description: The user attacks the target with\na pulsing blast of water.\nThis may also confuse the target.

name: Doom Desire
description: Two turns after this move is used, the\nuser blasts the target with a\nconcentrated bundle of light.

name: Psycho Boost
description: The user attacks the target at full power.\nThe attack’s recoil harshly lowers the\nuser’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Roost
description: The user lands and rests its body.\nIt restores the user’s HP by up to\nhalf of its max HP.

name: Gravity
description: Gravity is intensified for five turns,\nmaking moves involving flying unusable\nand negating Levitate.

name: Miracle Eye
description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by\nPsychic-type attacks. This also enables\nan evasive target to be hit.

name: Wake-Up Slap
description: This attack inflicts big damage on a\nsleeping target. This also wakes the target\nup, however.

name: Hammer Arm
description: The user swings and hits with its strong\nand heavy fist.\nIt lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: Gyro Ball
description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed\nspin. The slower the user compared to the\ntarget, the greater the move’s power.

name: Healing Wish
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon\ntaking its place will have its HP restored\nand status conditions cured.

name: Brine
description: If the target’s HP is half or less,\nthis attack will hit with double\nthe power.

name: Natural Gift
description: The user draws power to attack by using\nits held Berry.\nThe Berry determines the move’s type and power.

name: Feint
description: An attack that hits a target using\nProtect or Detect. This also lifts\nthe effects of those moves.

name: Pluck
description: The user pecks the target. If the target\nis holding a Berry, the user eats it and\ngains its effect.

name: Tailwind
description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind\nthat ups the Speed stat of the user and\nits allies for four turns.

name: Acupressure
description: The user applies pressure to stress\npoints, sharply boosting one of its or\nits allies’ stats.

name: Metal Burst
description: The user retaliates with much greater\npower against the target\nthat last inflicted damage on it.

name: U-turn
description: After making its attack, the user\nrushes back to switch places with\na party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Close Combat
description: The user fights the target up close\nwithout guarding itself. This also lowers\nthe user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: Payback
description: The user stores power, then attacks.\nIf the user moves after the target,\nthis attack’s power will be doubled.

name: Assurance
description: If the target has already taken some\ndamage in the same turn, this attack’s\npower is doubled.

name: Embargo
description: This move prevents the target from\nusing its held item. Its Trainer is\nalso prevented from using items on it.

name: Fling
description: The user flings its held item at the target\nto attack. This move’s power and effects\ndepend on the item.

name: Psycho Shift
description: Using its psychic power of suggestion,\nthe user transfers its status conditions\nto the target.

name: Trump Card
description: The fewer PP this move has,\nthe greater its power.

name: Heal Block
description: For five turns, the user prevents the\nopposing team from using any moves,\nAbilities, or held items that recover HP.

name: Wring Out
description: The user powerfully wrings the target.\nThe more HP the target has, the greater\nthe move’s power.

name: Power Trick
description: The user employs its psychic power to\nswitch its Attack with its Defense stat.

name: Gastro Acid
description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on\nthe target. The fluid eliminates the effect\nof the target’s Ability.

name: Lucky Chant
description: The user chants an incantation toward\nthe sky, preventing opposing Pokémon\nfrom landing critical hits.

name: Me First
description: The user cuts ahead of the target to steal and\nuse the target’s intended move with greater power.\nThis move fails if it isn’t used first.

name: Copycat
description: The user mimics the move used immediately\nbefore it. The move fails if no other move\nhas been used yet.

name: Power Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to\nswitch changes to its Attack and\nSp. Atk stats with the target.

name: Guard Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to\nswitch changes to its Defense and\nSp. Def stats with the target.

name: Punishment
description: The more the target has powered\nup with stat changes, the greater\nthe move’s power.

name: Last Resort
description: This move can be used only after the user\nhas used all the other moves it knows\nin the battle.

name: Worry Seed
description: A seed that causes worry is planted on\nthe target. It prevents sleep by making\nthe target’s Ability Insomnia.

name: Sucker Punch
description: This move enables the user to attack\nfirst. This move fails if the target is not\nreadying an attack.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the\nopposing team’s feet. They poison\nopposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Heart Swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to\nswitch stat changes with the target.

name: Aqua Ring
description: The user envelops itself in a veil made\nof water. It regains some HP every turn.

name: Magnet Rise
description: The user levitates using electrically\ngenerated magnetism for five turns.

name: Flare Blitz
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.\nThis also damages the user quite a lot.\nThis may leave the target with a burn.

name: Force Palm
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave.\nThis may also leave the target\nwith paralysis.

name: Aura Sphere
description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power\nfrom deep within its body at the target.\nThis attack never misses.

name: Rock Polish
description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag.\nThis can sharply raise the Speed stat.

name: Poison Jab
description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or\narm steeped in poison. This may also\npoison the target.

name: Dark Pulse
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued\nwith dark thoughts.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Night Slash
description: The user slashes the target\nthe instant an opportunity arises.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if\nit were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Seed Bomb
description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled\nseeds down on the target from above.

name: Air Slash
description: The user attacks with a blade of air that\nslices even the sky. This may also make the\ntarget flinch.

name: X-Scissor
description: The user slashes at the target by\ncrossing its scythes or claws as if\nthey were a pair of scissors.

name: Bug Buzz
description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a\ndamaging sound wave. This may also lower\nthe target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave\ngenerated by the user’s gaping mouth.

name: Dragon Rush
description: The user tackles the target while\nexhibiting overwhelming menace.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Power Gem
description: The user attacks with a ray of light that\nsparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: Drain Punch
description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s\nHP is restored by half the damage taken\nby the target.

name: Vacuum Wave
description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave\nof pure vacuum at the target.\nThis move always goes first.

name: Focus Blast
description: The user heightens its mental focus and\nunleashes its power.\nThis may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: Energy Ball
description: The user draws power from nature and\nfires it at the target.\nThis may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: Brave Bird
description: The user tucks in its wings and charges\nfrom a low altitude.\nThis also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Earth Power
description: The user makes the ground under\nthe target erupt with power.\nThis may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: Switcheroo
description: The user trades held items with the target\nfaster than the eye can follow.

name: Giga Impact
description: The user charges at the target using\nevery bit of its power.\nThe user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Nasty Plot
description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking\nbad thoughts.\nThis sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

name: Bullet Punch
description: The user strikes the target\nwith tough punches as fast as bullets.\nThis move always goes first.

name: Avalanche
description: An attack move that inflicts double the\ndamage if the user has been hurt by the\ntarget in the same turn.

name: Ice Shard
description: The user flash-freezes chunks of\nice and hurls them at the target.\nThis move always goes first.

name: Shadow Claw
description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made\nfrom shadows.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Thunder Fang
description: The user bites with electrified fangs.\nThis may also make the target flinch or\nleave it with paralysis.

name: Ice Fang
description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs.\nThis may also make the target flinch or\nleave it frozen.

name: Fire Fang
description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs.\nThis may also make the target flinch or leave\nit with a burn.

name: Shadow Sneak
description: The user extends its shadow and attacks\nthe target from behind.\nThis move always goes first.

name: Mud Bomb
description: The user launches a hard-packed\nmud ball to attack.\nThis may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Psycho Cut
description: The user tears at the target with blades\nformed by psychic power.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Zen Headbutt
description: The user focuses its willpower to its head\nand attacks the target.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Mirror Shot
description: The user lets loose a flash of energy at\nthe target from its polished body.\nThis may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Flash Cannon
description: The user gathers all its light energy and\nreleases it at once. This may also lower the\ntarget’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Rock Climb
description: The user attacks the target by smashing\ninto it with incredible force.\nThis may also confuse the target.

name: Defog
description: A strong wind blows away the target’s\nbarriers such as Reflect or Light Screen.\nThis also lowers the target’s evasiveness.

name: Trick Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which\nslower Pokémon get to move first for\nfive turns.

name: Draco Meteor
description: Comets are summoned down from the sky\nonto the target. The attack’s recoil\nharshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Discharge
description: The user strikes everything around it\nby letting loose a flare of electricity.\nThis may also cause paralysis.

name: Lava Plume
description: The user torches everything around it\nwith an inferno of scarlet flames.\nThis may also leave those hit with a burn.

name: Leaf Storm
description: The user whips up a storm of leaves around\nthe target. The attack’s recoil harshly\nlowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Power Whip
description: The user violently whirls its vines or\ntentacles to harshly lash the target.

name: Rock Wrecker
description: The user launches a huge boulder at the\ntarget to attack.\nThe user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Cross Poison
description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade\nthat may also poison the target.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Gunk Shot
description: The user shoots filthy garbage\nat the target to attack.\nThis may also poison the target.

name: Iron Head
description: The user slams the target\nwith its steel-hard head.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Magnet Bomb
description: The user launches steel bombs that\nstick to the target.\nThis attack never misses.

name: Stone Edge
description: The user stabs the target with\nsharpened stones from below.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Captivate
description: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite\ngender of the user, it is charmed, which\nharshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Stealth Rock
description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones\naround the opposing team. The trap hurts\nopposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

name: Grass Knot
description: The user snares the target with grass and\ntrips it. The heavier the target,\nthe greater the move’s power.

name: Chatter
description: The user attacks using a sound wave\nbased on words it has learned.\nThis confuses the target.

name: Judgment
description: The user releases countless shots of\nlight at the target. This move’s type varies\ndepending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user bites the target. If the target\nis holding a Berry, the user eats it and\ngains its effect.

name: Charge Beam
description: The user attacks with an electric\ncharge. The user may use any remaining\nelectricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

name: Wood Hammer
description: The user slams its rugged body into the\ntarget to attack. This also damages\nthe user quite a lot.

name: Aqua Jet
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed\nthat makes it almost invisible.\nThis move always goes first.

name: Attack Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to\npummel the target.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Defend Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to\nshield its body, raising its Defense\nand Sp. Def stats.

name: Heal Order
description: The user calls out its underlings to\nheal it. The user regains up to half of its\nmax HP.

name: Head Smash
description: The user attacks the target with a\nhazardous, full-power headbutt.\nThis also damages the user terribly.

name: Double Hit
description: The user slams the target with a long tail,\nvines, or a tentacle.\nThe target is hit twice in a row.

name: Roar of Time
description: The user blasts the target with power\nthat distorts even time.\nThe user can’t move on the next turn.

name: Spacial Rend
description: The user tears the target along with the\nspace around it.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Lunar Dance
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon\ntaking its place will have its status and\nHP fully restored.

name: Crush Grip
description: The target is crushed with great force.\nThe more HP the target has left,\nthe greater this move’s power.

name: Magma Storm
description: The target becomes trapped\nwithin a maelstrom of fire that rages\nfor four to five turns.

name: Dark Void
description: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into\na world of total darkness that makes\nthem sleep.

name: Seed Flare
description: The user emits a shock wave from\nits body to attack its target. This may\nalso harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: Ominous Wind
description: The user blasts the target with a gust of\nrepulsive wind. This may also raise all the\nuser’s stats at once.

name: Shadow Force
description: The user disappears, then strikes the\ntarget on the next turn.\nThis move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Hone Claws
description: The user sharpens its claws to\nboost its Attack stat and accuracy.

name: Wide Guard
description: The user and its allies are protected from\nwide-ranging attacks for one turn.

name: Guard Split
description: The user employs its psychic power to\naverage its Defense and Sp. Def stats\nwith those of the target.

name: Power Split
description: The user employs its psychic power to\naverage its Attack and Sp. Atk stats\nwith those of the target.

name: Wonder Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which\nPokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def\nstats are swapped for five turns.

name: Psyshock
description: The user materializes an odd\npsychic wave to attack the target.\nThis attack does physical damage.

name: Venoshock
description: The user drenches the target in a special\npoisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled\nif the target is poisoned.

name: Autotomize
description: The user sheds part of its body\nto make itself lighter and sharply\nraise its Speed stat.

name: Rage Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating\npowder to draw attention to itself.\nOpponents aim only at the user.

name: Telekinesis
description: The user makes the target float with its\npsychic power. The target is easier to\nhit for three turns.

name: Magic Room
description: The user creates a bizarre area\nin which Pokémon’s held items\nlose their effects for five turns.

name: Smack Down
description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile\nto attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon\nwill fall to the ground when it’s hit.

name: Storm Throw
description: The user strikes the target with a fierce\nblow. This attack always results in a\ncritical hit.

name: Flame Burst
description: The user attacks the target with a\nbursting flame. The bursting flame damages\nPokémon next to the target as well.

name: Sludge Wave
description: The user strikes everything around it\nby swamping the area with a giant sludge wave.\nThis may also poison those hit.

name: Quiver Dance
description: The user lightly performs a beautiful,\nmystic dance. This boosts the user’s\nSp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Heavy Slam
description: The user slams into the target with its\nheavy body. The more the user outweighs\nthe target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Synchronoise
description: Using an odd shock wave, the user\ninflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same\ntype in the area around it.

name: Electro Ball
description: The user hurls an electric orb\nat the target. The faster the user is\nthan the target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Soak
description: The user shoots a torrent of water\nat the target and changes\nthe target’s type to Water.

name: Flame Charge
description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks.\nThen, building up more power,\nthe user raises its Speed stat.

name: Coil
description: The user coils up and concentrates.\nThis raises its Attack and Defense stats\nas well as its accuracy.

name: Low Sweep
description: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs,\nwhich lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: Acid Spray
description: The user spits fluid that works to melt\nthe target. This harshly lowers\nthe target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: Foul Play
description: The user turns the target’s power\nagainst it. The higher the target’s Attack stat,\nthe greater the move’s power.

name: Simple Beam
description: The user’s mysterious psychic wave\nchanges the target’s Ability to Simple.

name: Entrainment
description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that\ncompels the target to mimic it, making the\ntarget’s Ability the same as the user’s.

name: After You
description: The user helps the target and makes it\nuse its move right after the user.

name: Round
description: The user attacks the target with a song.\nOthers can join in the Round and make\nthe attack do greater damage.

name: Echoed Voice
description: The user attacks the target with an\nechoing voice. If this move is used\nevery turn, it does greater damage.

name: Chip Away
description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes\nconsistently. The target’s stat changes\ndon’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: Clear Smog
description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of\nspecial mud. All stat changes are\nreturned to normal.

name: Stored Power
description: The user attacks the target with stored\npower. The more the user’s stats are\nraised, the greater the move’s power.

name: Quick Guard
description: The user protects itself and its allies\nfrom priority moves.

name: Ally Switch
description: The user teleports using a strange\npower and switches places with one of\nits allies.

name: Scald
description: The user shoots boiling hot water at\nits target. This may also leave the target\nwith a burn.

name: Shell Smash
description: The user breaks its shell, which lowers\nDefense and Sp. Def stats but sharply\nraises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

name: Heal Pulse
description: The user emits a healing pulse which\nrestores the target’s HP by up to\nhalf of its max HP.

name: Hex
description: This relentless attack does massive\ndamage to a target affected\nby status conditions.

name: Sky Drop
description: The user takes the target into the sky,\nthen drops it during the next turn.\nThe target cannot attack while in the sky.

name: Shift Gear
description: The user rotates its gears, raising its\nAttack and sharply raising its Speed.

name: Circle Throw
description: The target is thrown, and a different\nPokémon is dragged out. In the wild,\nthis ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Incinerate
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.\nIf a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a\nBerry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

name: Quash
description: The user suppresses the target and\nmakes its move go last.

name: Acrobatics
description: The user nimbly strikes the target.\nIf the user is not holding an item,\nthis attack inflicts massive damage.

name: Reflect Type
description: The user reflects the target’s type,\nmaking it the same type as the target.

name: Retaliate
description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally.\nIf an ally fainted in the previous turn,\nthis move becomes more powerful.

name: Final Gambit
description: The user risks everything to attack its\ntarget. The user faints but does damage\nequal to its HP.

name: Bestow
description: The user passes its held item to the\ntarget when the target isn’t holding\nan item.

name: Inferno
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target\nin an intense fire. This leaves the target\nwith a burn.

name: Water Pledge
description: A column of water strikes the target. When\ncombined with its fire equivalent, the\ndamage increases and a rainbow appears.

name: Fire Pledge
description: A column of fire hits the target. When used with\nits grass equivalent, its damage increases and\na vast sea of fire appears.

name: Grass Pledge
description: A column of grass hits the target. When used with\nits water equivalent, its damage increases and\na vast swamp appears.

name: Volt Switch
description: After making its attack, the user\nrushes back to switch places with\na party Pokémon in waiting.

name: Struggle Bug
description: While resisting, the user attacks the\nopposing Pokémon. This lowers the\nSp. Atk stat of those hit.

name: Bulldoze
description: The user strikes everything around it\nby stomping down on the ground.\nThis lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

name: Frost Breath
description: The user blows its cold breath on the\ntarget. This attack always results in\na critical hit.

name: Dragon Tail
description: The target is knocked away, and a different\nPokémon is dragged out. In the wild,\nthis ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

name: Work Up
description: The user is roused, and its Attack\nand Sp. Atk stats increase.

name: Electroweb
description: The user attacks and captures opposing\nPokémon using an electric net.\nThis lowers their Speed stat.

name: Wild Charge
description: The user shrouds itself in electricity\nand smashes into its target.\nThis also damages the user a little.

name: Drill Run
description: The user crashes into its target while\nrotating its body like a drill.\nCritical hits land more easily.

name: Dual Chop
description: The user attacks its target by hitting\nit with brutal strikes.\nThe target is hit twice in a row.

name: Heart Stamp
description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after\nits cute act makes the target less wary.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Horn Leech
description: The user drains the target’s energy with\nits horns. The user’s HP is restored\nby half the damage taken by the target.

name: Sacred Sword
description: The user attacks by slicing with a long\nhorn. The target’s stat changes\ndon’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: Razor Shell
description: The user cuts its target with sharp\nshells. This may also lower\nthe target’s Defense stat.

name: Heat Crash
description: The user slams its target with its flame-\ncovered body. The more the user outweighs\nthe target, the greater the move’s power.

name: Leaf Tornado
description: The user attacks its target by\nencircling it in sharp leaves. This attack\nmay also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: Steamroller
description: The user crushes its targets by rolling\nover them with its rolled-up body.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: Cotton Guard
description: The user protects itself by wrapping\nits body in soft cotton, which drastically\nraises the user’s Defense stat.

name: Night Daze
description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock\nwave at its target. This may also lower the\ntarget’s accuracy.

name: Psystrike
description: The user materializes an odd\npsychic wave to attack the target.\nThis attack does physical damage.

name: Tail Slap
description: The user attacks by striking the target\nwith its hard tail. It hits the target two\nto five times in a row.

name: Hurricane
description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent\nin a fierce wind that flies up into the sky.\nThis may also confuse the target.

name: Head Charge
description: The user charges its head into its\ntarget, using its powerful guard hair.\nThis also damages the user a little.

name: Gear Grind
description: The user attacks by throwing\nsteel gears at its target twice.

name: Searing Shot
description: The user torches everything around it\nwith an inferno of scarlet flames.\nThis may also leave those hit with a burn.

name: Techno Blast
description: The user fires a beam of light at\nits target. The move’s type changes\ndepending on the Drive the user holds.

name: Relic Song
description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks\nby appealing to the hearts of the listening\nopposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

name: Secret Sword
description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd\npower contained in the horn does physical\ndamage to the target.

name: Glaciate
description: The user attacks by blowing freezing\ncold air at opposing Pokémon.\nThis lowers their Speed stat.

name: Bolt Strike
description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount\nof electricity and charges its target.\nThis may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Blue Flare
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target\nin an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame.\nThis may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Fiery Dance
description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances\nand flaps its wings. This may also\nraise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Freeze Shock
description: On the second turn, the user hits the\ntarget with electrically charged ice.\nThis may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: Ice Burn
description: On the second turn, an ultracold,\nfreezing wind surrounds the target.\nThis may leave the target with a burn.

name: Snarl
description: The user yells as if it’s ranting about\nsomething, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat\nof opposing Pokémon.

name: Icicle Crash
description: The user attacks by harshly dropping\nlarge icicles onto the target.\nThis may also make the target flinch.

name: V-create
description: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user\nhurls itself at its target. This lowers the\nuser’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

name: Fusion Flare
description: The user brings down a giant flame.\nThis move is more powerful when\ninfluenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

name: Fusion Bolt
description: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt.\nThis move is more powerful when\ninfluenced by an enormous flame.

name: Flying Press
description: The user dives down onto the target\nfrom the sky. This move is Fighting\nand Flying type simultaneously.

name: Mat Block
description: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user\nprotects itself and its allies from damaging moves.\nThis does not stop status moves.

name: Belch
description: The user lets out a damaging belch\nat the target. The user must eat a held\nBerry to use this move.

name: Rototiller
description: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier\nfor plants to grow. This raises the Attack\nand Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

name: Sticky Web
description: The user weaves a sticky net around\nthe opposing team, which lowers their\nSpeed stat upon switching into battle.

name: Fell Stinger
description: When the user knocks out a target\nwith this move, the user’s Attack stat\nrises sharply.

name: Phantom Force
description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes\nthe target on the next turn.\nThis move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: Trick-or-Treat
description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating.\nThis adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

name: Noble Roar
description: Letting out a noble roar, the user\nintimidates the target and lowers\nits Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Ion Deluge
description: The user disperses electrically charged\nparticles, which changes Normal-type\nmoves to Electric-type moves.

name: Parabolic Charge
description: The user attacks everything around it.\nThe user’s HP is restored by half\nthe damage taken by those hit.

name: Forest’s Curse
description: The user puts a forest curse on the target.\nAfflicted targets are now Grass type as well.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard\nand attacks everything around it.

name: Freeze-Dry
description: The user rapidly cools the target.\nThis may also leave the target frozen.\nThis move is super effective on Water types.

name: Disarming Voice
description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does\nemotional damage to opposing Pokémon.\nThis attack never misses.

name: Parting Shot
description: With a parting threat, the user lowers\nthe target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.\nThen it switches with a party Pokémon.

name: Topsy-Turvy
description: All stat changes affecting the target\nturn topsy-turvy and become the\nopposite of what they were.

name: Draining Kiss
description: The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss.\nThe user’s HP is restored by over half\nof the damage taken by the target.

name: Crafty Shield
description: The user protects itself and its allies from\nstatus moves with a mysterious power.\nThis does not stop moves that do damage.

name: Flower Shield
description: The user raises the Defense stat\nof all Grass-type Pokémon in battle\nwith a mysterious power.

name: Grassy Terrain
description: The user turns the ground under everyone’s feet\nto grass for five turns. This restores the HP of\nPokémon on the ground a little every turn.

name: Misty Terrain
description: The user covers the ground under everyone’s feet\nwith mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon\non the ground from status conditions.

name: Electrify
description: If the target is electrified before it uses\na move during that turn, the target’s\nmove becomes Electric type.

name: Play Rough
description: The user plays rough with the target\nand attacks it. This may also lower\nthe target’s Attack stat.

name: Fairy Wind
description: The user stirs up a fairy wind\nand strikes the target with it.

name: Moonblast
description: Borrowing the power of the moon,\nthe user attacks the target.\nThis may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Boomburst
description: The user attacks everything around it\nwith the destructive power of a terrible,\nexplosive sound.

name: Fairy Lock
description: By locking down the battlefield,\nthe user keeps all Pokémon from\nfleeing during the next turn.

name: King’s Shield
description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects\nitself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack\nstat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

name: Play Nice
description: The user and the target become friends,\nand the target loses its will to fight.\nThis lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: Confide
description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target\nloses its ability to concentrate. This lowers\nthe target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Diamond Storm
description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds\nto damage opposing Pokémon. This may\nalso raise the user’s Defense stat.

name: Steam Eruption
description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam.\nThis may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Hyperspace Hole
description: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears\nright next to the target and strikes. This\nalso hits a target using Protect or Detect.

name: Water Shuriken
description: The user hits the target with throwing\nstars two to five times in a row.\nThis move always goes first.

name: Mystical Fire
description: The user attacks by breathing\na special, hot fire. This also\nlowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Spiky Shield
description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks,\nthis move also damages any attacker who\nmakes direct contact.

name: Aromatic Mist
description: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally\nPokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

name: Eerie Impulse
description: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse.\nExposing the target to it harshly lowers\nthe target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: Venom Drench
description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd\npoisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack,\nSp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

name: Powder
description: The user covers the target in a powder\nthat explodes and damages the target\nif it uses a Fire-type move.

name: Geomancy
description: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises\nits Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats\non the next turn.

name: Magnetic Flux
description: The user manipulates magnetic fields,\nwhich raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats\nof ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

name: Happy Hour
description: Using Happy Hour doubles\nthe amount of prize money\nreceived after battle.

name: Electric Terrain
description: The user electrifies the ground under\neveryone’s feet for five turns.\nPokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

name: Dazzling Gleam
description: The user damages opposing Pokémon\nby emitting a powerful flash.

name: Celebrate
description: The Pokémon congratulates\nyou on your special day!

name: Hold Hands
description: The user and an ally hold hands.\nThis makes them very happy.

name: Baby-Doll Eyes
description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll\neyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move\nalways goes first.

name: Nuzzle
description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified\ncheeks against the target. This also leaves\nthe target with paralysis.

name: Hold Back
description: The user holds back when it attacks\nand the target is left with at least 1 HP.

name: Infestation
description: The target is infested and attacked for\nfour to five turns.\nThe target can’t flee during this time.

name: Power-Up Punch
description: Striking opponents over and over makes\nthe user’s fists harder.\nHitting a target raises the Attack stat.

name: Oblivion Wing
description: The user absorbs its target’s HP.\nThe user’s HP is restored by over half\nof the damage taken by the target.

name: Thousand Arrows
description: This move also hits opposing Pokémon\nthat are in the air. Those Pokémon are\nknocked down to the ground.

name: Thousand Waves
description: The user attacks with a wave\nthat crawls along the ground.\nThose hit can’t flee from battle.

name: Land’s Wrath
description: The user gathers the energy of the land\nand focuses that power on opposing\nPokémon to damage them.

name: Light of Ruin
description: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower,\nthe user fires a powerful beam of light.\nThis also damages the user quite a lot.

name: Hidden Power (Fighting)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Flying)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Poison)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Ground)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Rock)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Bug)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Ghost)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Steel)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Fire)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Water)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Grass)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Electric)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Psychic)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Ice)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Dragon)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Hidden Power (Dark)
description: A unique attack that varies in type\ndepending on the Pokémon using it.\n

name: Écras’Face
description: Écrase l’ennemi avec les pattes avant ou la queue,\npar exemple.

name: Poing-Karaté
description: L’ennemi est tranché violemment.\nTaux de critiques élevé.

name: Torgnoles
description: Gifle rapidement l’ennemi de deux à cinq fois\nd’affilée.

name: Poing Comète
description: Une tornade de coups de poing qui frappe de\ndeux à cinq fois d’affilée.

name: Ultimapoing
description: L’ennemi reçoit un coup de poing d’une puissance\nincroyable.

name: Jackpot
description: Des pièces sont lancées sur l’ennemi.\nPermet d’obtenir de l’argent à la fin du combat.

name: Poing de Feu
description: Un coup de poing enflammé vient frapper l’ennemi.\nPeut le brûler.

name: Poing-Glace
description: Un coup de poing glacé vient frapper l’ennemi.\nPeut le geler.

name: Poing-Éclair
description: Un coup de poing électrique vient frapper l’ennemi.\nPeut le paralyser.

name: Griffe
description: Lacère l’ennemi avec des griffes acérées pour lui\ninfliger des dégâts.

name: Force Poigne
description: L’ennemi est attrapé et compressé par les côtés.

name: Guillotine
description: De méchantes pinces lacèrent l’ennemi, le mettant\nK.O. sur le coup s’il est touché.

name: Coupe-Vent
description: Attaque en deux tours.\nDes lames de vent frappent l’ennemi au second\ntour. Taux de critiques élevé.

name: Danse-Lames
description: Danse frénétique qui exalte l’esprit combatif.\nAugmente beaucoup l’Attaque du lanceur.

name: Coupe
description: Coupe l’ennemi avec des lames ou des griffes.\nHors combat, permet de couper des arbres fins.

name: Tornade
description: Le lanceur bat des ailes pour générer une\nbourrasque qui blesse l’ennemi.

name: Cru-Aile
description: L’ennemi est frappé par de larges ailes déployées\npour infliger des dégâts.

name: Cyclone
description: Éjecte le Pokémon ennemi et le remplace par\nun autre. Dans la nature, met fin au combat.

name: Vol
description: Le lanceur s’envole au premier tour et frappe au\nsecond. Permet aussi de voler jusqu’à une ville\ndéjà visitée.

name: Étreinte
description: Ligote l’ennemi avec les tentacules ou le corps\npour l’écraser durant quatre à cinq tours.

name: Souplesse
description: Fouette l’ennemi avec la queue ou une liane,\npar exemple, pour infliger des dégâts.

name: Fouet Lianes
description: Fouette l’ennemi avec de fines lianes pour infliger\ndes dégâts.

name: Écrasement
description: Écrase l’ennemi avec un énorme pied.\nPeut aussi l’apeurer.

name: Double Pied
description: Deux coups de pied qui frappent l’ennemi deux\nfois d’affilée.

name: Ultimawashi
description: Un coup de pied superpuissant et intense qui\nfrappe l’ennemi.

name: Pied Sauté
description: Le lanceur s’envole pour décocher un coup de\npied sauté. S’il échoue, le lanceur se blesse.

name: Mawashi Geri
description: Le lanceur effectue un coup de pied tournoyant\net extrêmement rapide. Peut apeurer l’ennemi.

name: Jet de Sable
description: Lance du sable au visage de l’ennemi pour baisser\nsa Précision.

name: Coup d’Boule
description: Le lanceur donne un coup de tête.\nPeut apeurer l’ennemi.

name: Koud’Korne
description: Frappe l’ennemi d’un coup de corne pointue pour\ninfliger des dégâts.

name: Furie
description: Frappe l’ennemi deux à cinq fois d’affilée avec\nun bec ou une corne, par exemple.

name: Empal’Korne
description: Un coup de corne en vrille qui empale l’ennemi,\nle mettant K.O. sur le coup s’il est touché.

name: Charge
description: Le lanceur charge l’ennemi et le percute de tout\nson corps.

name: Plaquage
description: Le lanceur se laisse tomber sur l’ennemi de tout\nson poids. Peut aussi le paralyser.

name: Ligotage
description: Le lanceur ligote l’ennemi avec des lianes ou son\ncorps pour l’écraser durant quatre à cinq tours.

name: Bélier
description: Une charge violente qui blesse aussi légèrement\nle lanceur.

name: Mania
description: Une attaque furieuse qui dure de deux à\ntrois tours. Le lanceur devient confus.

name: Damoclès
description: Une charge dangereuse et imprudente.\nBlesse aussi gravement le lanceur.

name: Mimi-Queue
description: Le lanceur remue son adorable queue pour\ntromper la vigilance de l’ennemi et baisser\nsa Défense.

name: Dard-Venin
description: Un dard toxique qui transperce l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi l’empoisonner.

name: Double-Dard
description: Un double coup de dard qui transperce l’ennemi\ndeux fois d’affilée. Peut aussi l’empoisonner.

name: Dard-Nuée
description: Envoie une rafale de dards.\nPeut toucher de deux à cinq fois.

name: Groz’Yeux
description: Le lanceur fait les gros yeux à l’ennemi pour\nl’intimider et baisser sa Défense.

name: Morsure
description: L’ennemi est mordu par de tranchantes\ncanines. Peut l’apeurer.

name: Rugissement
description: Le lanceur pousse un cri tout mimi pour tromper la\nvigilance de l’ennemi et baisser son Attaque.

name: Hurlement
description: Effraie le Pokémon ennemi et le remplace par un\nautre. Dans la nature, met fin au combat.

name: Berceuse
description: Une berceuse plonge l’ennemi dans un profond\nsommeil.

name: Ultrason
description: Le lanceur produit d’étranges ondes sonores qui\nrendent confus.

name: Sonicboom
description: Une onde de choc destructrice qui inflige toujours\n20 PV de dégâts.

name: Entrave
description: Empêche l’ennemi d’employer à nouveau\nsa dernière attaque. Dure quatre tours.

name: Acide
description: Le lanceur attaque l’ennemi avec un jet d’acide\ncorrosif. Peut aussi baisser sa Défense Spéciale.

name: Flammèche
description: L’ennemi est attaqué par de faibles flammes.\nPeut aussi le brûler.

name: Lance-Flammes
description: L’ennemi reçoit un torrent de flammes.\nPeut aussi le brûler.

name: Brume
description: Une brume blanche enveloppe l’équipe du lanceur\net empêche la réduction des stats pour cinq tours.

name: Pistolet à O
description: De l’eau est projetée en arc de cercle sur\nl’ennemi.

name: Hydrocanon
description: Un puissant jet d’eau est dirigé sur l’ennemi.

name: Surf
description: Une énorme vague s’abat sur le champ de bataille.\nPermet aussi de voyager sur l’eau.

name: Laser Glace
description: Un rayon de glace frappe l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le geler.

name: Blizzard
description: Une violente tempête de neige est déclenchée\nsur l’ennemi. Peut aussi le geler.

name: Rafale Psy
description: Un étrange rayon frappe l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le rendre confus.

name: Bulles d’O
description: Des bulles sont envoyées avec puissance\nsur l’ennemi. Peut aussi baisser sa Vitesse.

name: Onde Boréale
description: Envoie un rayon arc-en-ciel sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi baisser son Attaque.

name: Ultralaser
description: Projette un puissant rayon sur l’ennemi.\nLe lanceur doit se reposer au tour suivant.

name: Picpic
description: Frappe l’ennemi d’un bec pointu ou d’une corne\npour infliger des dégâts.

name: Bec Vrille
description: Une attaque utilisant le bec comme une perceuse.

name: Sacrifice
description: Le lanceur agrippe l’ennemi et l’écrase au sol.\nBlesse aussi légèrement le lanceur.

name: Balayage
description: Un puissant coup de pied bas qui fauche l’ennemi.\nIl est plus efficace contre les ennemis lourds.

name: Riposte
description: Une riposte qui répond à toute attaque physique\nen infligeant le double de dégâts.

name: Frappe Atlas
description: L’ennemi est projeté grâce au pouvoir de la\ngravité. Inflige des dégâts équivalents au niveau\ndu lanceur.

name: Force
description: Le lanceur cogne l’ennemi de toutes ses forces.\nPermet aussi de déplacer des rochers.

name: Vol-Vie
description: Une attaque qui convertit la moitié des dégâts\ninfligés en PV pour le lanceur.

name: Méga-Sangsue
description: Une attaque qui convertit la moitié des dégâts\ninfligés en PV pour le lanceur.

name: Vampigraine
description: Une graine est semée sur l’ennemi.\nÀ chaque tour, elle lui dérobe des PV que le\nlanceur récupère.

name: Croissance
description: Le corps du lanceur se développe.\nAugmente l’Attaque et l’Attaque Spéciale.

name: Tranch’Herbe
description: Des feuilles aiguisées comme des rasoirs entaillent\nl’ennemi. Taux de critiques élevé.

name: Lance-Soleil
description: Absorbe la lumière au premier tour et envoie un\nrayon puissant au tour suivant.

name: Poudre Toxik
description: Une poudre toxique empoisonne l’ennemi.

name: Para-Spore
description: Le lanceur répand sur l’ennemi une poudre qui le\nparalyse.

name: Poudre Dodo
description: Le lanceur répand une poudre soporifique qui\nendort la cible.

name: Danse-Fleur
description: Le lanceur attaque en projetant des pétales\npendant deux à trois tours avant de céder à\nla confusion.

name: Sécrétion
description: Le lanceur crache de la soie pour ligoter l’ennemi\net baisser sensiblement sa Vitesse.

name: Draco-Rage
description: La colère du lanceur déclenche une onde de choc\ndestructrice qui inflige toujours 40 PV de dégâts.

name: Danse Flamme
description: Un tourbillon de flammes emprisonne l’ennemi\npendant quatre à cinq tours.

name: Éclair
description: Une décharge électrique tombe sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le paralyser.

name: Tonnerre
description: Une grosse décharge électrique tombe sur\nl’ennemi. Peut aussi le paralyser.

name: Cage-Éclair
description: Un faible choc électrique frappe l’ennemi.\nSi l’attaque le touche, celui-ci est paralysé.

name: Fatal-Foudre
description: La foudre tombe sur l’ennemi pour lui infliger\ndes dégâts. Peut aussi le paralyser.

name: Jet-Pierres
description: Le lanceur lâche une pierre sur l’ennemi.

name: Séisme
description: Le lanceur provoque un tremblement de terre\ntouchant tous les Pokémon autour de lui.

name: Abîme
description: Le lanceur fait tomber l’ennemi dans une crevasse.\nSi cette attaque réussit, elle met K.O. sur le coup.

name: Tunnel
description: Le lanceur creuse au premier tour et frappe au\nsecond. Permet aussi de sortir des grottes.

name: Toxik
description: Empoisonne gravement l’ennemi.\nLes dégâts dus au poison augmentent à chaque\ntour.

name: Choc Mental
description: Une faible vague télékinésique frappe l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le plonger dans la confusion.

name: Psyko
description: Une puissante force télékinésique frappe l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi faire baisser sa Défense Spéciale.

name: Hypnose
description: Le lanceur hypnotise l’ennemi pour le plonger\ndans un profond sommeil.

name: Yoga
description: Le lanceur médite pour éveiller son pouvoir latent\net augmenter son Attaque.

name: Hâte
description: Le lanceur se relaxe et allège son corps pour\naugmenter considérablement sa Vitesse.

name: Vive-Attaque
description: Le lanceur fonce sur l’ennemi si rapidement qu’on\nparvient à peine à le discerner. Frappe toujours en\npremier.

name: Frénésie
description: Une fois activée, cette capacité augmente\nl’Attaque du lanceur à mesure que celui-ci\nsubit des attaques.

name: Téléport
description: Permet de fuir un Pokémon sauvage.\nPermet aussi de revenir au dernier Centre\nPokémon visité.

name: Ombre Nocturne
description: Le lanceur invoque un mirage.\nInflige des dégâts équivalents au niveau du\nlanceur.

name: Copie
description: Le lanceur copie la dernière capacité utilisée par\nla cible et la conserve tant qu’il reste au combat.

name: Grincement
description: Cri strident qui baisse beaucoup la Défense\nde l’ennemi.

name: Reflet
description: Le lanceur se déplace si vite qu’il crée des copies\nillusoires de lui, augmentant son Esquive.

name: Soin
description: Un soin qui permet au lanceur de récupérer\njusqu’à la moitié de ses PV max.

name: Armure
description: Le lanceur contracte tous ses muscles pour\naugmenter sa Défense.

name: Lilliput
description: Le lanceur comprime son corps pour se faire tout\npetit et augmenter fortement son Esquive.

name: Brouillard
description: Le lanceur disperse un nuage d’encre ou de\nfumée. Réduit la Précision de l’ennemi.

name: Onde Folie
description: Un rayon sinistre qui plonge l’ennemi dans un état\nde confusion.

name: Repli
description: Le lanceur se recroqueville dans sa carapace,\nce qui augmente sa Défense.

name: Boul’Armure
description: Le lanceur s’enroule pour cacher ses points\nfaibles, ce qui augmente sa Défense.

name: Bouclier
description: Le lanceur érige un mur solide qui augmente\nfortement sa Défense.

name: Mur Lumière
description: Un fabuleux mur de lumière qui réduit les dégâts\ncausés par les attaques spéciales durant cinq tours.

name: Buée Noire
description: Un brouillard qui annule les changements de stats\nde tous les Pokémon au combat.

name: Protection
description: Un fabuleux mur de lumière qui réduit les dégâts\ncausés par les attaques physiques durant cinq\ntours.

name: Puissance
description: Le lanceur prend une profonde inspiration et se\nconcentre pour augmenter son taux de critiques.

name: Patience
description: Le lanceur encaisse les coups durant deux tours et\nréplique en infligeant le double des dégâts subis.

name: Métronome
description: Agite un doigt et stimule le cerveau pour utiliser\npresque n’importe quelle capacité au hasard.

name: Mimique
description: Le lanceur riposte à l’attaque de l’ennemi avec la\nmême attaque.

name: Destruction
description: Le lanceur explose en blessant tous les Pokémon\nautour de lui. Le lanceur tombe K.O.

name: Bomb’Œuf
description: De toutes ses forces, le lanceur jette un gros œuf\nsur l’ennemi pour lui infliger des dégâts.

name: Léchouille
description: Un grand coup de langue qui inflige des dégâts\nà l’ennemi. Peut aussi le paralyser.

name: Purédpois
description: Le lanceur attaque à l’aide d’une éruption de gaz\nrépugnants. Peut aussi empoisonner l’ennemi.

name: Détritus
description: Des détritus toxiques sont projetés sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi l’empoisonner.

name: Massd’Os
description: Le lanceur frappe l’ennemi à grands coups d’os.\nPeut aussi l’apeurer.

name: Déflagration
description: Un déluge de flammes ardentes submerge\nl’ennemi. Peut aussi le brûler.

name: Cascade
description: Le lanceur charge l’ennemi à une vitesse\nremarquable, ce qui peut l’apeurer.\nPermet aussi de franchir une cascade.

name: Claquoir
description: Le lanceur piège l’ennemi dans sa dure coquille et\nl’écrase pendant quatre à cinq tours.

name: Météores
description: Le lanceur envoie des rayons d’étoiles.\nTouche toujours l’ennemi.

name: Coud’Krâne
description: Le lanceur baisse la tête pour augmenter sa\nDéfense au premier tour et percuter l’ennemi au\nsecond.

name: Picanon
description: Envoie une rafale de dards.\nPeut toucher de deux à cinq fois.

name: Constriction
description: De longs tentacules ou lianes attaquent l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi baisser sa Vitesse.

name: Amnésie
description: Le lanceur fait le vide dans son esprit pour\noublier ses soucis. Augmente fortement sa\nDéfense Spéciale.

name: Télékinésie
description: Le lanceur distrait l’ennemi en pliant une cuiller.\nPeut aussi baisser sa Précision.

name: E-Coque
description: Le lanceur récupère jusqu’à la moitié de ses\nPV max. En dehors des combats, permet de\ntransférer des PV du lanceur à un allié.

name: Pied Voltige
description: Le lanceur s’élance pour effectuer un coup de\ngenou sauté. S’il échoue, le lanceur se blesse.

name: Regard Médusant
description: Le lanceur intimide l’ennemi grâce à son regard\nterrifiant pour le paralyser.

name: Dévorêve
description: Le lanceur mange le rêve de l’ennemi endormi.\nIl récupère en PV la moitié des dégâts infligés.

name: Gaz Toxik
description: Un nuage de gaz toxique est projeté au visage de\nl’ennemi. Peut l’empoisonner.

name: Pilonnage
description: Projette de deux à cinq grosses boules sur\nl’ennemi.

name: Vampirisme
description: Une attaque qui aspire le sang de l’ennemi.\nLa moitié des dégâts sont convertis en PV pour\nle lanceur.

name: Grobisou
description: Le lanceur fait un bisou à l’ennemi en prenant une\nmine effrayante. Endort l’ennemi.

name: Piqué
description: Une attaque en deux tours au taux de critiques\nélevé. Peut aussi apeurer l’ennemi.

name: Morphing
description: Le lanceur devient une copie de sa cible et obtient\nla même palette de capacités.

name: Écume
description: Des bulles frappent l’ennemi.\nPeut réduire sa Vitesse.

name: Uppercut
description: Un enchaînement de coups de poing cadencés\nfrappe l’ennemi. Peut aussi le rendre confus.

name: Spore
description: Le lanceur répand un nuage de spores qui endort.

name: Flash
description: Une explosion lumineuse qui fait baisser la\nPrécision de l’ennemi.

name: Vague Psy
description: Une étrange onde d’énergie chaude frappe\nl’ennemi. Cette attaque est d’intensité variable.

name: Trempette
description: Le lanceur barbote et éclabousse les environs.\nCette capacité n’a aucun effet.

name: Acidarmure
description: Le lanceur modifie sa structure moléculaire pour se\nliquéfier et augmenter fortement sa Défense.

name: Pince-Masse
description: Une grande pince martèle l’ennemi.\nTaux de critiques élevé.

name: Explosion
description: Le lanceur explose et inflige des dégâts à tous\nles Pokémon autour de lui. Met K.O. le lanceur.

name: Combo-Griffe
description: L’ennemi est lacéré par des faux ou des griffes\nde deux à cinq fois d’affilée.

name: Osmerang
description: Le lanceur projette son os comme un boomerang.\nCette attaque frappe à l’aller et au retour.

name: Repos
description: Le lanceur regagne tous ses PV et soigne ses\nproblèmes de statut, puis il dort pendant deux\ntours.

name: Éboulement
description: Envoie de gros rochers sur l’ennemi pour infliger\ndes dégâts. Peut aussi l’apeurer.

name: Croc de Mort
description: Le lanceur mord l’ennemi à l’aide de ses incisives\naiguisées. Peut aussi l’apeurer.

name: Affûtage
description: Le lanceur réduit son nombre de polygones pour\naccentuer ses angles et augmenter son Attaque.

name: Conversion
description: Le lanceur change de type pour prendre celui\nde la première capacité de sa liste.

name: Triplattaque
description: Le lanceur envoie trois boules d’énergie\nsimultanément. Peut aussi paralyser, brûler ou\ngeler l’ennemi.

name: Croc Fatal
description: Une vilaine morsure d’incisives qui réduit de moitié\nles PV de l’ennemi.

name: Tranche
description: Un coup de griffe ou autre tranche l’ennemi.\nTaux de critiques élevé.

name: Clonage
description: Le lanceur fait une copie de lui-même en sacrifiant\nquelques PV. La copie sert de leurre.

name: Lutte
description: Une attaque désespérée, utilisée quand le lanceur\nn’a plus de PP. Le blesse aussi légèrement.

name: Gribouille
description: Le lanceur apprend le dernier coup utilisé par la\ncible. Gribouille disparaît après utilisation.

name: Triple Pied
description: Une salve de un à trois coups de pied dont\nla puissance augmente à chaque coup porté.

name: Larcin
description: Le lanceur attaque la cible et vole son objet.\nLe lanceur ne peut rien voler s’il tient déjà\nun objet.

name: Toile
description: Le lanceur enserre l’ennemi à l’aide d’une fine\nsoie gluante pour l’empêcher de fuir le combat.

name: Lire-Esprit
description: Le lanceur analyse les mouvements de l’ennemi\npour être sûr de toucher au coup suivant.

name: Cauchemar
description: Un cauchemar qui inflige des dégâts à chaque tour\nà un ennemi endormi.

name: Roue de Feu
description: Le lanceur s’entoure de feu et charge l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le brûler.

name: Ronflement
description: Une attaque qui ne fonctionne que si le lanceur\nest endormi. Le boucan peut aussi apeurer\nl’ennemi.

name: Malédiction
description: Une capacité à l’effet différent selon que le\nlanceur est un Pokémon Spectre ou non.

name: Fléau
description: Le lanceur fait tournoyer son fléau.\nPlus ses PV sont bas, plus l’attaque est puissante.

name: Conversion 2
description: Le lanceur change de type pour être résistant au\ntype de la dernière attaque lancée par sa cible.

name: Aéroblast
description: Le lanceur projette une tornade sur l’ennemi pour\ninfliger des dégâts. Taux de critiques élevé.

name: Spore Coton
description: Le lanceur libère des spores cotonneuses qui\ncollent à l’ennemi et baissent fortement sa Vitesse.

name: Contre
description: Le lanceur ne retient plus ses coups.\nPlus ses PV sont bas et plus l’attaque est\npuissante.

name: Dépit
description: Le lanceur exprime son ressentiment en retirant\n4 PP de la dernière attaque de l’ennemi.

name: Poudreuse
description: Le lanceur projette de la neige poudreuse.\nPeut aussi geler l’ennemi.

name: Abri
description: Le lanceur esquive toutes les attaques.\nLe risque d’échec augmente lorsque la capacité\nest utilisée plusieurs fois de suite.

name: Mach Punch
description: Coup de poing fulgurant.\nFrappe toujours en premier.

name: Grimace
description: Une grimace qui effraie l’ennemi et réduit\nfortement sa Vitesse.

name: Feinte
description: Le lanceur s’approche l’air de rien avant de frapper\npar surprise. N’échoue jamais.

name: Doux Baiser
description: Le lanceur envoie un bisou si mignon et désarmant\nqu’il plonge l’ennemi dans la confusion.

name: Cognobidon
description: Améliore l’Attaque au maximum en sacrifiant\nla moitié des PV max.

name: Bomb-Beurk
description: Des détritus toxiques sont projetés sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi l’empoisonner.

name: Coud’Boue
description: Le lanceur envoie de la boue au visage de\nl’ennemi pour infliger des dégâts et baisser\nsa Précision.

name: Octazooka
description: Le lanceur attaque en projetant de l’encre au\nvisage de l’ennemi. Peut aussi baisser sa Précision.

name: Picots
description: Le lanceur disperse des piquants sur le sol pour\nblesser tout ennemi qui entre au combat.

name: Élecanon
description: Un boulet de canon électrifié qui inflige des\ndégâts et paralyse l’ennemi.

name: Clairvoyance
description: Permet de toucher un Pokémon Spectre avec\nn’importe quelle capacité ou de toucher un\nennemi insaisissable.

name: Prélèvem. Destin
description: Quand cette capacité est activée, elle met K.O.\nun ennemi qui porte un coup fatal au lanceur.

name: Requiem
description: Tout Pokémon qui entend ce requiem est K.O.\ndans trois tours à moins qu’il ne quitte le combat.

name: Vent Glace
description: Une bourrasque de vent froid blesse l’ennemi.\nRéduit aussi sa Vitesse.

name: Détection
description: Le lanceur esquive toutes les attaques.\nLe risque d’échec augmente lorsque la capacité\nest utilisée plusieurs fois de suite.

name: Charge-Os
description: Le lanceur frappe l’ennemi avec un os\nde deux à cinq fois d’affilée.

name: Verrouillage
description: Verrouille l’ennemi pour ne pas le rater au tour\nsuivant.

name: Colère
description: Le lanceur laisse éclater sa rage et attaque\npendant deux à trois tours avant de céder à\nla confusion.

name: Tempête de Sable
description: Une tempête de sable qui blesse tous les\nPokémon durant cinq tours, sauf ceux de types\nRoche, Sol et Acier.

name: Giga-Sangsue
description: Une attaque qui convertit la moitié des dégâts\ninfligés en PV pour le lanceur.

name: Ténacité
description: Le lanceur résiste aux attaques avec 1 PV.\nPeut échouer si utilisée plusieurs fois de suite.

name: Charme
description: Le lanceur fait les yeux doux pour berner l’ennemi\net réduire considérablement son Attaque.

name: Roulade
description: Un rocher roule sur l’ennemi pendant cinq tours.\nL’attaque gagne en puissance à chaque coup.

name: Faux-Chage
description: Le lanceur retient ses coups pour que l’ennemi\ngarde au moins 1 PV et ne tombe pas K.O.

name: Vantardise
description: Fait enrager la cible et la plonge dans la confusion,\nmais augmente fortement son Attaque.

name: Lait à Boire
description: Le lanceur récupère jusqu’à la moitié de ses\nPV max. En dehors des combats, permet de\ntransférer des PV du lanceur à un allié.

name: Étincelle
description: Lance une charge électrique sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi le paralyser.

name: Taillade
description: Un coup de faux ou de griffe dont la force\naugmente quand il touche plusieurs fois d’affilée.

name: Aile d’Acier
description: Le lanceur frappe l’ennemi avec des ailes d’acier.\nPeut aussi augmenter la Défense du lanceur.

name: Regard Noir
description: Le lanceur pétrifie l’ennemi en lui lançant un\nregard noir. Il devient incapable de s’enfuir.

name: Attraction
description: Si l’ennemi est du sexe opposé, il tombe amoureux\net rechigne alors à attaquer.

name: Blabla Dodo
description: Le lanceur utilise un de ses coups au hasard\npendant qu’il dort.

name: Glas de Soin
description: Carillon apaisant qui soigne les problèmes de\nstatut de tous les Pokémon de l’équipe.

name: Retour
description: Plus le Pokémon apprécie son Dresseur, plus\nla puissance de cette attaque furieuse augmente.

name: Cadeau
description: Le lanceur attaque en offrant un cadeau piégé à la\ncible. Peut cependant restaurer certains de ses PV.

name: Frustration
description: Moins le Pokémon aime son Dresseur, plus cette\nattaque est puissante.

name: Rune Protect
description: Crée un champ protecteur qui empêche tous les\nproblèmes de statut pendant cinq tours.

name: Balance
description: Le lanceur ajoute ses PV à ceux de sa cible et les\nrépartit équitablement.

name: Feu Sacré
description: Le lanceur génère un feu mystique d’une intensité\nredoutable pour attaquer l’ennemi. Peut aussi le\nbrûler.

name: Ampleur
description: Provoque un tremblement de terre d’intensité\nvariable qui affecte tous les Pokémon alentour.\nL’efficacité varie.

name: Dynamopoing
description: Le lanceur rassemble ses forces et envoie un coup\nde poing à l’ennemi. Rend ce dernier confus.

name: Mégacorne
description: Le lanceur utilise ses gigantesques cornes pour\ncharger l’ennemi.

name: Dracosouffle
description: Le lanceur souffle fort sur l’ennemi pour lui infliger\ndes dégâts. Peut aussi le paralyser.

name: Relais
description: Le lanceur échange sa place et tout changement\nde stat avec un Pokémon de l’équipe.

name: Encore
description: Oblige l’ennemi à répéter durant trois tours la\ndernière capacité utilisée.

name: Poursuite
description: Une attaque qui inflige deux fois plus de dégâts à\nun ennemi qui quitte le combat.

name: Tour Rapide
description: Une attaque tournoyante pouvant aussi annuler\npar exemple Étreinte, Ligotage, Vampigraine ou\nPicots.

name: Doux Parfum
description: Un doux parfum qui réduit sensiblement l’Esquive\nde l’ennemi. Utilisé hors d’un combat, attire aussi\nles Pokémon sauvages.

name: Queue de Fer
description: Attaque l’ennemi avec une queue de fer.\nPeut aussi baisser sa Défense.

name: Griffe Acier
description: Attaque avec des griffes d’acier.\nPeut aussi augmenter l’Attaque du lanceur.

name: Corps Perdu
description: Le lanceur porte son coup en dernier.\nEn échange, cette capacité n’échoue jamais.

name: Aurore
description: Un soin qui restaure des PV au lanceur.\nSon efficacité varie en fonction de la météo.

name: Synthèse
description: Un soin qui restaure des PV au lanceur.\nSon efficacité varie en fonction de la météo.

name: Rayon Lune
description: Un soin qui restaure des PV au lanceur.\nSon efficacité varie en fonction de la météo.

name: Puissance Cachée
description: Attaque dont le type dépend du Pokémon\nqui l’utilise.

name: Coup-Croix
description: Le lanceur délivre un coup double en croisant les\navant-bras. Taux de critiques élevé.

name: Ouragan
description: Déclenche un terrible ouragan sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi l’apeurer.

name: Danse Pluie
description: Invoque de fortes pluies qui durent cinq tours et\naugmentent la puissance des capacités de type\nEau.

name: Zénith
description: Fait briller le soleil pendant cinq tours, augmentant\nla puissance des capacités de type Feu.

name: Mâchouille
description: Le lanceur mord l’ennemi de ses crocs pointus.\nPeut aussi baisser sa Défense.

name: Voile Miroir
description: Une riposte qui contre n’importe quelle attaque\nspéciale en infligeant le double des dégâts subis.

name: Boost
description: Une autohypnose qui permet au lanceur de copier\nles changements de stats de la cible.

name: Vitesse Extrême
description: Le lanceur charge à une vitesse renversante.\nFrappe toujours en premier.

name: Pouvoir Antique
description: Une attaque préhistorique qui peut augmenter\ntoutes les stats du lanceur d’un seul coup.

name: Ball’Ombre
description: Projette une grande ombre sur l’ennemi.\nPeut aussi faire baisser sa Défense Spéciale.

name: Prescience
description: De l’énergie psychique vient frapper l’ennemi\ndeux tours après l’utilisation de cette capacité.

name: Éclate-Roc
description: Porte un coup de poing à l’ennemi qui peut\nbaisser sa Défense. Peut aussi briser des rochers\nfissurés.

name: Siphon
description: Piège l’ennemi dans une trombe d’eau pendant\nquatre à cinq tours.

name: Baston
description: Le lanceur appelle tous les Pokémon de son\néquipe à attaquer. Plus ils sont nombreux, plus\nil y a d’attaques.

name: Bluff
description: Permet de frapper en premier et apeure l’ennemi.\nNe fonctionne qu’au premier tour.

name: Brouhaha
description: Le lanceur attaque en rugissant durant trois tours.\nPendant ce temps, aucun Pokémon ne peut\ns’endormir.

name: Stockage
description: Le lanceur accumule de la puissance et augmente\nsa Défense et sa Défense Spéciale.\nPeut être utilisé trois fois.

name: Relâche
description: Libère dans une attaque la puissance\nprécédemment accumulée avec Stockage.

name: Avale
description: Le lanceur absorbe la puissance accumulée avec\nStockage pour restaurer ses PV.

name: Canicule
description: Le lanceur provoque une vague de chaleur.\nPeut aussi brûler l’ennemi.

name: Grêle
description: Invoque une tempête de grêle qui dure cinq tours.\nNe blesse pas les Pokémon de type Glace.

name: Tourmente
description: Le lanceur irrite l’ennemi pour l’empêcher d’utiliser\nla même capacité deux fois de suite.

name: Flatterie
description: Rend la cible confuse, mais augmente son\nAttaque Spéciale.

name: Feu Follet
description: Lance une sinistre flamme violette à l’ennemi pour\nlui infliger une brûlure.

name: Souvenir
description: Le lanceur est mis K.O., mais l’Attaque et\nl’Attaque Spéciale de l’ennemi baissent beaucoup.

name: Façade
description: Une attaque dont la puissance double lorsque le\nlanceur est empoisonné, paralysé ou brûlé.

name: Mitra-Poing
description: Le lanceur se concentre avant d’attaquer.\nÉchoue s’il est touché avant d’avoir frappé.

name: Stimulant
